job_tasks.phrase: Integreren van energienetbeheerfuncties in virtuele assistenten om klantbeleving en functionaliteit te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes integrating specific functionalities (energy network management) into virtual assistants, which is a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van innovatieve virtuele assistenten voor spraak- en tekstinteracties.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of software applications (virtual assistants) for specific interaction types.

job_tasks.phrase: Opzetten en beheren van het platform om een robuuste en schaalbare infrastructuur te waarborgen.
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and managing a platform for robustness and scalability falls under the operations and infrastructure management aspect of deploying and maintaining systems.

job_tasks.phrase: wij zoeken iemand om ons team te begeleiden om het volledige potentieel van Microsoft Copilot Studio te benutten.
job_tasks.justification: Guiding a team to leverage a platform's full potential implies understanding the business needs and strategic application of the technology.

job_tasks.phrase: Daarnaast integreer je essentiële functies om ons schaarste personeel te ondersteunen binnen deze virtuele assistenten, zodat een naadloze gebruikerservaring wordt gegarandeerd.
job_tasks.justification: Supporting scarce personnel and ensuring a seamless user experience by integrating functions points to understanding business needs and user impact.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met cross-functionele teams om projectvereisten te definiëren en hoogwaardige oplossingen te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with cross-functional teams to define requirements and deliver solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Begeleiden van het team in het optimaal benutten van de mogelijkheden van het Microsoft Copilot Studio platform.
job_tasks.justification: Guiding the team to optimally utilize a platform's capabilities implies understanding the strategic and business value of the technology.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met cross-functionele teams om projectvereisten te definiëren en hoogwaardige oplossingen te leveren.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with cross-functional teams to define requirements and deliver solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Ontwikkelen van innovatieve virtuele assistenten voor spraak- en tekstinteracties.
soft_skills.justification: The use of 'innovative' suggests a focus on creating new solutions, aligning with innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Begeleiden van het team in het optimaal benutten van de mogelijkheden van het Microsoft Copilot Studio platform.
soft_skills.justification: Guiding the team to optimally utilize a platform's capabilities implies understanding the strategic and business value of the technology.

profile.rationale: The job primarily focuses on integrating and developing virtual assistants using Microsoft Copilot Studio, which falls under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). While it involves AI technology (virtual assistants), the core tasks are about building and integrating these into existing systems and managing the platform, rather than deep model development or fine-tuning (Macro-Category B). The role is about leveraging an existing AI platform to enhance business functions and user experience, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines the core responsibilities of integrating and developing virtual assistants using a specific platform (Microsoft Copilot Studio). The tasks are well-defined within software engineering and operational aspects. The profile assignment is straightforward based on the emphasis on integration and development rather than core AI model work. A slightly lower score is given because the 'Senior' aspect and 'guiding the team' could imply some leadership or strategic input, but the core technical tasks are clearly defined.
